comments.body: `HMS.size` is `O(n)` so this is quadratic in the number of strings you intern. You probably want to keep track of the next free id in `EncodeEnv` to avoid this (there are other places that suffer from the same problem), e.g., `allocString`.
I've added fields `nextInternedStringId` and `nextInternedDottedNameId` to the `EncodeEnv` to track these numbers explicitly.
